definition: occurring among members of a family usually by heredity
details:
adjective
- occurring among members of a family usually by heredity
= synonyms: transmissible
- of or relating to the science of genetics
= example: of or relating to the science of genetics
= synonyms: genetical
- pertaining to or referring to origin
= example: pertaining to or referring to origin
- of or relating to or produced by or being a gene
= synonyms: genic
